Description: CRM/ATS for ambitious recruiting firms of all sizes.
Name: Vincere

Methods.Name: Update Distribution List
Methods.Description: Update List of Distribution List of a Contact based on User's Permission.

Methods.Name: Get Distribution List - Add Contacts
Methods.Description: Get Distribution Lists a User can use to add Contacts to.

Methods.Name: Get Distribution List - User Permission
Methods.Description: Get Distribution Lists of a Contact based on User's Permission.

Methods.Name: Get Job
Methods.Description: Get a Job by ID.

Methods.Name: Search Jobs
Methods.Description: Return jobs based on query (See Vincere API documentation)

Methods.Name: List Updated Jobs
Methods.Description: Return a list updated since last run.

Methods.Name: List Jobs
Methods.Description: Return a list of Job records.

Methods.Name: Get Contact Source
Methods.Description: Get a Contact Source by its Source ID.

Methods.Name: List Candidate Sources
Methods.Description: Get a List of All Candidate Sources.

Methods.Name: List Contact Sources
Methods.Description: Get a List of All Contact Sources.

Methods.Name: Create Contact
Methods.Description: Create a New Contact.

Methods.Name: Update Contact
Methods.Description: Update a Contact.

Methods.Name: List Updated Contact Records
Methods.Description: Return a list of updated contact records matched with the search criteria since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Search Contact by ID.
Methods.Description: Get a Contact by ID, this method returns all the fields for a contact.

Methods.Name: Upsert Contact Custom Fields
Methods.Description: Creates or updates contact custom fields.

Methods.Name: Get Contact Custom Fields
Methods.Description: Get a Contacts custom fields by ID.

Methods.Name: Delete Contact
Methods.Description: Delete a Contact.

Methods.Name: Get Contact
Methods.Description: Get a Contact by ID.

Methods.Name: Search Contact by Email
Methods.Description: Get a Contact by email, this method returns all the fields for a contact.

Methods.Name: List New Contact Records
Methods.Description: Return a list of new contact records matched with the search criteria since last run time.

Methods.Name: List Contact Records
Methods.Description: Return a list of contact records matched with the search criteria.

Methods.Name: Test Method
Methods.Description: Temp for debugging

Methods.Name: Get User
Methods.Description: Get a user for a given ID.

Methods.Name: Get Current User
Methods.Description: Get the currently authenticated user.

Methods.Name: List Users
Methods.Description: Get a List of All Users.

Methods.Name: Reject Application
Methods.Description: Currently, only possible to reject application in stage shortlisted or sent or in stage interviewing but does not have an on-going interview.

Methods.Name: Add Application
Methods.Description: Applications, otherwise known as Job submissions, Job status, Job objects or Job actions. Applications associate Candidates with Jobs. Candidate applications always have exactly 1 job.

Methods.Name: List Job's Applications
Methods.Description: List the Applications associate with a Job.

Methods.Name: Get Application
Methods.Description: Get details of the specified application

Methods.Name: List Active Applications by Candidate
Methods.Description: List the list of active applications by candidate ID.

Methods.Name: Get Accessible Talent Pools
Methods.Description: Get talent pools a user can use to add candidates to.

Methods.Name: Update Candidate Talent Pools
Methods.Description: Update list of talent pools of a candidate based on user's permission

Methods.Name: Get Candidate Talent Pool
Methods.Description: Get talent pools of a candidate based on user's permission

Methods.Name: Get Candidate Custom Fields
Methods.Description: Get a Candidates Custom Fields by ID.

Methods.Name: Upsert Candidate Custom Fields
Methods.Description: Creates or updates a Candidates custom field values.

Methods.Name: Get Candidate Source Contact
Methods.Description: Get the source contact of the specified candidate.

Methods.Name: List Candidate Owners
Methods.Description: Return a list of all candidate owners for a given candidate.

Methods.Name: List Updated Candidate Records
Methods.Description: Return a list of updated candidate records matched with the search criteria since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Get Candidate By Email
Methods.Description: Get a candidate by email.

Methods.Name: Delete Candidate
Methods.Description: Delete a Candidate by ID.

Methods.Name: List New Candidate Records
Methods.Description: Return a list of candidate records matched with the search criteria since the last run time.

Methods.Name: List Candidate Records
Methods.Description: Return a list of candidate records matched with the search criteria.

Methods.Description: Get a Candidate by ID.

Methods.Description: Create a Candidate.

Methods.Description: Update a Candidate.

Methods.Description: Update the status of an email subscription.

Methods.Name: List Companies
Methods.Description: Return a list of Company records matched with the search criteria.

Methods.Description: Get the details of the specified Company.

Methods.Description: Get a company by name.
